description: This source file contains Python code defining functions for mapping architectures, ABIs, endianness, and configuring uClibc build features in a build system environment, likely BitBake. It appears to be part of a build recipe or configuration script related to uClibc cross-compilation.

methods.name: map_uclibc_arch
methods.description: Returns the uClibc architecture string based on the target architecture.

methods.name: map_uclibc_abi
methods.description: Returns the uClibc ABI string based on the target OS.

methods.name: map_uclibc_endian
methods.description: Returns the endianess ('BIG' or 'LITTLE') for uClibc based on architecture.

methods.name: uclibc_cfg
methods.description: Helper function to configure uClibc features based on provided features and tokens.

methods.name: features_to_uclibc_settings
methods.description: Maps distro features to uClibc configuration settings and return configuration and removal strings.

methods.name: features_to_uclibc_conf
methods.description: Returns uClibc configuration string based on current build environment.

methods.name: features_to_uclibc_del
methods.description: Returns configuration removal commands for uClibc based on current build environment.

methods.name: find_cfgs
methods.description: Finds all .cfg files among source patches.
